sentences.en: Don't read the report word for word now; just skim it.
sentences.cn: 现在,不要逐字读报告, 大致地看一下就可以了.

sentences.en: He tried to skim off the best players from the local school teams.
sentences.cn: 他试图从当地学校的球队中选拔出一批最好的球员.

sentences.en: I only had time to skim through the script before I flew over here.
sentences.cn: 我在乘飞机来这儿之前，只来得及把稿子浏览了一遍。

sentences.en: If you skim through the play too quickly, you'll forget the plot.
sentences.cn: 如果你读剧本读得太快, 就会忘记剧中主要情节.

sentences.en: It's important for you to skim through the text.
sentences.cn: 浏览课文对你来说很重要.

sentences.en: Look at the way those insects skim over the water.
sentences.cn: 请看看这些昆虫掠过水面的方式.

sentences.en: Remember to skim off the fat from the soup before you give it to our guests.
sentences.cn: 别忘了把汤上的浮油撇去,然后再端给我们的客人.

sentences.en: Rich Italian clubs such as AC Milan cannot simply skim off all of Europe's stars.
sentences.cn: 像AC米兰这样财大气粗的意大利足球俱乐部也不可能把欧洲所有的明星球员统统招到自己门下。

sentences.en: She started to skim through the report, then slowed down, then stopped.
sentences.cn: 她开始浮光掠影地看了一下这个报告, 然后慢下来, 最后停了下来.

sentences.en: Skim the scum off the jam and let it cool.
sentences.cn: 撇去果酱上的浮沫，让它冷却。

sentences.en: Strain the sauce and skim away any fat that rises to the surface.
sentences.cn: 把酱汁滤一下,然后撇去浮在上面的油脂.

sentences.en: The ball skimmed across the grass and stopped against the wall.
sentences.cn: 球掠过草地，在墙边停了下来。

sentences.en: The low - flying plane seemed to skim the rooftops.
sentences.cn: 低飞之飞机就好像从房顶掠过一样.

sentences.en: Will you please skim the fat off from the soup?
sentences.cn: 请您把菜汤中的油脂撇去好吗?

words.tran_cn: 漏杓；燕鸥类；大略阅读的人；撇去浮沫的器具
浏览，掠过；去除（skim的过去分词）
脱脂的；撇去浮沫的；表层的

trans.tran_cn: 脱脂的；撇去浮沫的；表层的
撇；撇去的东西；表层物；瞒报所得的收入

trans.tran_en: to read something quickly to find the main facts or ideas in it
